resources.string: Music library is the main acitvity of the app and user can choose to play music or discover online music

Now playing activity is where user get when he click on album in the libray to show what is playing and give capability to pause, skip or rewind and he can go to discover music activity to discover similar music
here user can discover new music and can select what he wants to buy if he wish
here user can buy music online from the player store and payments is handled by android Pay API
Android Pay is a free service that allows merchants to process frictionless payments for mobile and e-commerce transactions.
